attributes.action: ensure equality in service delivery for ALL homeland Security Services by making SIA registration a requirement of employment for the Police as it is for other internal security personnel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to provide a consistent and minimum standard of internal security training and procedures, make all Police officers pass the full SIA Regulations as per private Close Protection or Door Supervisors.  This SIA registration should be a requirement of police employment.

This will provide the public confidence that should the Police break the same rules that private security people have to follow, they will lose their SIA Licence and therefore their job and any other security related role until they can re-register with the SIA again.
